data:
Dr. Wladislav Lyatsky Atmospheric, Planetary and Space Physics Contact E-Mail: lyatsky@cspar.uah.edu  Recent Publications Lyatsky, W., and A. Tan, Latitudinal effect in semiannual variation of geomagnetic
                  activity, J. Geophys. Res., accepted, 2002 in press. Lyatsky, W., A. Tan, and G. V. Khazanov, Solar Wind Disturbances Responsible for Geomagnetic
                  Storms, J. Geophys. Res., accepted, 2002 in press. Kozlovsky, A., A. Koustov, W. Lyatsky, J. Kangas, G. Parks, and D. Chua, Ionospheric
                  convection in the postnoon auroral oval: SuperDARN and Polar UVI observations, J.
                  Geophys. Res., accepted, 2002 in press. Benkevitch, L. V., W. Lyatsky, A. V. Koustov, G. J. Sofko, and A. M. Hamza, Substorm
                  onset times as derived from geomagnetic indices, Geophys. Res. Lett., 28, No. 11,
                  2002. Lyatsky, W., P. T. Newell, and A. M. Hamza, Solar illumination as cause of the equinoctial
                  preference for geomagnetic activity, Geophys. Res. Lett., 28, 2353-2356, 2001. Lyatsky, W., and A. M. Hamza, Possible role of ion demagnetization in the plasma sheet
                  in auroral arc and substorm generation, Space Sci. Rev., 95, 373-385, 2001. Lyatsky, W., and A. M. Hamza, Seasonal and diurnal variations of geomagnetic activity
                  and their role in Space Weather forecast, Canad. J. Phys., 76, 907-920, 2001. Lyatsky, W., L. L. Cogger, B. Jackel, A. M. Hamza, W. J. Hughes, D. Murr, and Ole
                  Rasmussen, Substorm development as observed by Interball UV imager and 2-D magnetic
                  array, J. Atmos. Solar-Terr. Phys., 63, 1609-1621, 2001. Lyatsky, W., and A. M. Hamza, A possible role of magnetosphere-ionosphere coupling
                  in auroral arc generation, Ann. Geophys., 18, 1108-1117, 2000. Benkevich, L., W. Lyatsky, and L. L. Cogger, Field-aligned currents between conjugate
                  hemispheres, J. Geophys. Res., 105, 27,727- 27,738, 2000.
